page.title: 05 Ecology_Garden birds
page.content: The most common garden birds are the sparrow,blue and great tit,thrush ,blackbird,crow,robin ,bullfinch and chaffinch.These birds all eat nuts, worms,insects, berries and bread. Most of these birds get eaten by stoats and weasels, other bigger birds and cats.Some cats do not actually eat these birds but play with them. In the winter the birds may suffocate in the snow or be prevented from going to the bird table by larger birds such as pheasants or crows.The small birds may starve to death. You can recognize the finches by reddish pink stomachs and black heads.The tits are smaller . Most garden birds are around the same size although they each have a distinctive call.
